attributes.action: order all MP's to pay back all expenses claims that are deemed unlawful.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This government and all party MP's have taken advantage of their positions and made claims for expenses that are truely outrageous. I think the whole country will feel that the current system of expenses claiming is corrupt. With an independant investagation into the whole affair any unlawful claims should be paid back, after all this money was ours earned by all us hard working tax payers. Why should we carry on paying our taxes when the government wastes it with these claims, its just not right!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
